Class MazeEditor

java.lang.Object
fr.connexe.ui.MazeEditor
public class MazeEditor extends Object
Class to manage the selection, deletion and addition of walls in the maze.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    MazeEditor.Side
    Four possible directions for the walls of the labyrinth.

  • Constructor Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyBorder(Region gridCell, int row, int col, GridPane grid, String type)
    Applies the action "type" to the cell (black=add a wall, transparent=remove a wall).
    void
    applyGraphMaze(int col, int row, int neighborCol, int neighborRow, String type)
    Applies the action "type" to the graph maze by connecting/disconnecting the two vertices.
    void
    applyNeighborBorder(MazeEditor.Side side, int row, int col, GridPane grid, String type)
    Applies the action "type" to the neighbor of the cell (split of applyBorder() for more clarity).

    Clears all the red borders of the maze.

  • Constructor Details

    • MazeEditor

      public MazeEditor()
      Constructor for the maze editor.

  • Method Details

    • setGraphMaze

      public void setGraphMaze(GraphMaze graphMaze)
      Sets the maze this editor is working on.
      Parameters:
      graphMaze - the maze to set

    • setEditMode

      public void setEditMode(boolean editMode)
      Enables maze editing.
      Parameters:
      editMode - true to enable editing, false to disable it

    • configureCellClick

      public void configureCellClick(Region gridCell, int row, int col, GridPane grid)
      Select a wall when it's clicked. There is a margin of 10 around the wall to make it easier to click.
      Parameters:
      gridCell - the cell that was clicked
      row - the row of the cell
      col - the column of the cell
      grid - the grid containing the maze cells (used to retrieve the cell at the clicked position)

    • getColors

      public String[] getColors(String style)
      Get the colors of the borders of a cell.
      Parameters:
      style - style of the cell
      Returns:
      the colors of the borders of the cell

    • setBorderColor

      public void setBorderColor(Region gridCell, MazeEditor.Side side)
      Sets the border color of a cell, which was selected by selectWall, to red.
      Parameters:
      gridCell - the cell that was clicked
      side - the wall that was clicked (top, right, bottom, left)

    • resetBorderColor

      public void resetBorderColor(Region gridCell)
      Resets all the border colors of a cell to their initial colors (black or transparent).
      Parameters:
      gridCell - the cell that was clicked (used to retrieve the initial style)

    • getCellFromGrid

      public Region getCellFromGrid(GridPane grid, int col, int row)
      Returns the cell at the given position in the grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - Labyrinth Grid
      col - the column of the cell
      row - the row of the cell
      Returns:
      the cell at the given position in the grid, or null if the cell doesn't exist in the grid or is not a Region.

    • configureCellCommands

      public void configureCellCommands(Region gridCell, int row, int col, GridPane grid)
      If the user presses backspace or delete, the wall is deleted. If he presses enter or space, the wall is added.
      Parameters:
      gridCell - the cell that was clicked and can be remembered due to the focus in selectWall
      row - the row of the cell
      col - the column of the cell
      grid - the grid containing the maze cells (used to retrieve the cell at the clicked position)

    • applyBorder

      public void applyBorder(Region gridCell, int row, int col, GridPane grid, String type)
      Applies the action "type" to the cell (black=add a wall, transparent=remove a wall).
      Parameters:
      gridCell - the cell that was clicked
      row - the row of the cell
      col - the column of the cell
      grid - the grid containing the maze cells (used to retrieve the cell at the clicked position)
      type - the color to apply (black or transparent)

    • clearAllRedBorders

      public void clearAllRedBorders(GridPane grid)
      Clears all the red borders of the maze.
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid containing the maze cells

    • applyNeighborBorder

      public void applyNeighborBorder(MazeEditor.Side side, int row, int col, GridPane grid, String type)
      Applies the action "type" to the neighbor of the cell (split of applyBorder() for more clarity).
      Parameters:
      side - the wall that was removed/added
      row - the row of the cell
      col - the column of the cell
      grid - the grid containing the maze cells (used to retrieve the cell at the clicked position)
      type - the color to apply (black or transparent)

    • applyGraphMaze

      public void applyGraphMaze(int col, int row, int neighborCol, int neighborRow, String type)
      Applies the action "type" to the graph maze by connecting/disconnecting the two vertices.
      Parameters:
      col - the column of the cell
      row - the row of the cell
      neighborCol - the column of the neighbor cell
      neighborRow - the row of the neighbor cell
      type - the color to apply (black or transparent)
